channel.title: News about changing from combustion to charging
channel.description: News about changing from combustion to charging

item.title: MORE POWER. MORE TORQUE.MAX ADVENTURE.
item.description:
MORE POWER. MORE TORQUE.MAX ADVENTURE.

The Zero DSR is an amped-up version of the Zero DS, bringing unprecedented levels of power and torque to the world’s most versatile electric motorcycle. For the dual sport rider demanding more, the Zero DSR delivers 56% more torque and 25% more power. A 660 amp controller is paired with a Z-Force® motor that contains higher temperature magnets to ensure better performance during extended durations at higher speeds. The result is exhilarating acceleration and even greater prowess off-road.

item.title: Amp Hours vs Kilowatt Hours
item.description:
Amp Hours vs Kilowatt Hours

Simply put, Amp Hours are a measure of electric current and Kilowatt Hours are a measure of electric power. However, there is a relationship between the two. Specifically, electric current is a component of an equation that helps to determine electric power. That equation is...

item.title: Geeking out on electric motorcycles - a trip to the Zero factory
item.description:
Geeking out on electric motorcycles - a trip to the Zero factory

Regular readers will know I'm a bit of a fan of Zero's electric motorcycles - as the market leader in performance electric two-wheelers, Zero offers a glimpse into a future where gasoline engines feel frankly archaic.

item.title: Lithium Air: IBM's quest for the super-battery
item.description:
Lithium Air: IBM's quest for the super-battery

The days of $1.50 gasoline are long gone, and high costs coupled with environmental concerns have ignited a search for the battery that will power the cars of the future. IBM is at the forefront of this effort with its development of the lithium air super-battery.

item.title: Breakthough in lithium-air batteries
item.description:
Breakthough in lithium-air batteries

Lithium-air batteries excite alternative energy fans because they can store up to ten times the energy of today's lithium-ion batteries, an energy density similar to that of gasoline.

item.title: ChargeMap - Die Karte mit allen Ladestationen für Elektroautos
item.description:
ChargeMap - Die Karte mit allen Ladestationen für Elektroautos

ChargeMap listet alle Stromtankstellen und Ladestationen für Elektroautofahrer auf.
